verses.verse: לְדָוִ֨ד ׀ <WH1732> [A Psalm] of David שָׁפְטֵ֤נִי <WH8199> Judge יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> me O LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> in אֲ֭נִי <WH589> my בְּתֻמִּ֣י <WH8537> in mine integrity הָלַ֑כְתִּי <WH1980> for I have walked וּבַיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> also in the LORD בָּ֝טַ֗חְתִּי <WH982> I have trusted לֹ֣א <WH3808> without אֶמְעָֽד׃ <WH4571> [therefore] I shall not slide
בְּחָנֵ֣נִי <WH974> Examine יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> me O LORD וְנַסֵּ֑נִי <WH5254> and prove [צְרֹופָה כ] (צָרְפָ֖ה <WH6884> cast ק) כִלְיוֹתַ֣י <WH3629> my reins וְלִבִּֽי׃ <WH3820> and my heart

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For חַ֭סְדְּךָ <WH2617> For thy lovingkindness לְנֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> about עֵינָ֑י <WH5869> [is] before mine eyes וְ֝הִתְהַלַּ֗כְתִּי <WH1980> and I have walked בַּאֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH571> in thy truth

לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor יָ֭שַׁבְתִּי <WH3427> I have not sat עִם־ <WH5973> with מְתֵי־ <WH4962> persons שָׁ֑וְא <WH7723> with vain וְעִ֥ם <WH5973> with נַ֝עֲלָמִ֗ים <WH5956> with dissemblers לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor אָבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> neither will I go in

שָׂ֭נֵאתִי <WH8130> I have hated קְהַ֣ל <WH6951> the congregation מְרֵעִ֑ים <WH7489> of evil doers וְעִם־ <WH5973> with רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> with the wicked לֹ֣א <WH3808> and I will not אֵשֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> and will not sit

אֶרְחַ֣ץ <WH7364> I will wash בְּנִקָּי֣וֹן <WH5356> in innocency כַּפָּ֑י <WH3709> mine hands וַאֲסֹבְבָ֖ה <WH5437> so will I compass אֶת־ <WH853> מִזְבַּחֲךָ֣ <WH4196> thine altar יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> O LORD

לַ֭שְׁמִעַ <WH8085> That I may publish בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> with the voice תּוֹדָ֑ה <WH8426> of thanksgiving וּ֝לְסַפֵּ֗ר <WH5608> and tell כָּל־ <WH3605> all נִפְלְאוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6381> of all thy wondrous works

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> LORD אָ֭הַבְתִּי <WH157> I have loved מְע֣וֹן <WH4583> the habitation בֵּיתֶ֑ךָ <WH1004> of thy house וּ֝מְק֗וֹם <WH4725> and the place מִשְׁכַּ֥ן <WH4908> dwelleth כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3519> where thine honour

אַל־ <WH408> Nor תֶּאֱסֹ֣ף <WH622> Gather עִם־ <WH5973> with חַטָּאִ֣ים <WH2400> with sinners נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> not my soul וְעִם־ <WH5973> with אַנְשֵׁ֖י <WH376> men דָמִ֣ים <WH1818> with bloody חַיָּֽי׃ <WH2416> nor my life
אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whose בִּידֵיהֶ֥ם <WH3027> In whose hands זִמָּ֑ה <WH2154> [is] mischief וִֽ֝ימִינָ֗ם <WH3225> and their right hand מָ֣לְאָה <WH4390> is full שֹּֽׁחַד׃ <WH7810> of bribes
וַ֭אֲנִי <WH589> my בְּתֻמִּ֥י <WH8537> in mine integrity אֵלֵ֗ךְ <WH1980> shall walk פְּדֵ֣נִי <WH6299> redeem וְחָנֵּֽנִי׃ <WH2603> me and be merciful
רַ֭גְלִי <WH7272> My foot עָֽמְדָ֣ה <WH5975> standeth בְמִישׁ֑וֹר <WH4334> in an even place בְּ֝מַקְהֵלִ֗ים <WH4721> in the congregations אֲבָרֵ֥ךְ <WH1288> will I bless יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD
